ygData.subject: Re: Spare skill points
ygData.msgSnippet: Bard trainers in Qeynos and Freeport both have it. ... From: Virgil Allen  To:  Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 10:20
ygData.messageBody:
Bard trainers in Qeynos and Freeport both have it.
----- Original Message -----
From: Virgil Allen <VirgilA@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 10:20 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Spare skill points


>From: Virgil Allen <VirgilA@...>
>
>Milord Kelton,
>
> Is it possible to learn Faerie? That is one I have not seen as of
>yet. Where did you learn this language from?
>
>-----Original Message-----
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Spare skill points
>From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
><big snip>
>And it's a lot of fun to be able to talk in Ogre or Froglok or Faerie.
>Plus, magicians will love you for it, they're in desperate need of language
>tutors, so they can research spells.
>
>
>John Capozzi,
>
>Kelton, Bertox (and formerly Veeshan)
>Kendrick, Beta
>
><another big snip>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Who offers the richest group communications tools on the Internet?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Answer: ONElist. Check out our homepage for details!
